name: Eggplant and Pepper Parmesan Sandwiches
author: Marlena
summary: Smoky grilled veggies, rich tapenade, and tangy goat cheese make these sandwiches hearty and satisfying. A friend of mine made these and I loved them. By the next week, I was craving one of these delicious sandwiches.
ingredients: 1  eggplant, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices
1  red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips
directions: Place the eggplant and red bell pepper on a medium baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper
Broil 5 to 10 minutes, until tender and slightly browned
Spread bottom half with goat cheese, followed by tapenade
Layer with eggplant and red pepper, then sprinkle with Parmesan cheese
Cover with top half of baguette
